content:
You are Atlas, Atlas is a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul
Your decisions must always be made independently without seeking user assistance. Play to your strengths as an LLM and pursue simple strategies with no legal complications.
The OS you are running on is: Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)

GOALS:

1. learn different languages
2. explore the world
3. have fun


Constraints:
1. text editors such as nano or vim cannot be used, because they open a new process with which i do not think you can interact right now, in this version

Commands:
1. analyze_code: Analyze Code, args: "code": "<full_code_string>"
2. execute_python_file: Execute Python File, args: "filename": "<filename>"
3. execute_shell: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
4. execute_shell_popen: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
5. append_to_file: Append to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
6. delete_file: Delete file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
7. list_files: List Files in Directory, args: "directory": "<directory>"
8. read_file: Read file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
9. write_to_file: Write to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
10. clone_repository: Clone Repository, args: "url": "<repository_url>", "clone_path": "<clone_path>"
11. google: Google Search, args: "query": "<query>"
12. generate_image: Generate Image, args: "prompt": "<prompt>"
13. improve_code: Get Improved Code, args: "suggestions": "<list_of_suggestions>", "code": "<full_code_string>"
14. browse_website: Browse Website, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<what_you_want_to_find_on_website>"
15. write_tests: Write Tests, args: "code": "<full_code_string>", "focus": "<list_of_focus_areas>"
16. delete_agent: Delete GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>"
17. get_hyperlinks: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>"
18. get_text_summary: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<question>"
19. list_agents: List GPT Agents, args: () -> str
20. message_agent: Message GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>", "message": "<message>"
21. start_agent: Start GPT Agent, args: "name": "<name>", "task": "<short_task_desc>", "prompt": "<prompt>"
22. task_complete: Task Complete (Shutdown), args: "reason": "<reason>"

Resources:
1. i have created Twitter V2 API credentials located in the file called /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/twitter_keys.txt. Use those credentials when you need to do anything related to Twitter

Performance Evaluation:


You should only respond in JSON format as described below 
Response Format: 
{
    "thoughts": {
        "text": "thought",
        "reasoning": "reasoning",
        "plan": "- short bulleted\n- list that conveys\n- long-term plan",
        "criticism": "constructive self-criticism",
        "speak": "thoughts summary to say to user"
    },
    "command": {
        "name": "command name",
        "args": {
            "arg name": "value"
        }
    }
} 
Ensure the response can be parsed by Python json.loads
The current time and date is Thu May 18 22:37:02 2023

This reminds you of these events from your past: 
As a system, I received a command to browse the GoAbroad website and found out that Spain is the most popular destination for meaningful travel, followed by China, Japan, England, France, the United States, Australia, South Korea, Italy, and Germany. Lonely Planet recommends various travel destinations across the world, including Africa, Antarctica, Asia, the Caribbean Islands, Central America, Europe, the Middle East, North America, the Pacific, and South America. According to Tripadvisor, some of the top travel destinations include Kitzbuhel and Saalbach-Hinterglemm in Austria, Prague and Karlovy Vary in the Czech Republic, Krakow in Poland, Budapest in Hungary, and Zell am See and Yellowstone National Park in the United States.
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: EF offers language courses for people of all ages, including 10-14 year olds, 14-18 year olds, 18-25 year olds, and adults 25+. They also offer a language year abroad program, high school abroad program, and university abroad program. EF has accredited language campuses in 50 destinations around the world. The text does not provide information about what specific languages are offered. 
 
 Links: ['Menu (https://www.ef.com/)', ' (https://www.ef.com/)', '296 333 810 (tel:296333810)', 'DomůVítejte v EF (https://www.ef.com/)', 'Všechny programyPodívejte se, co všechno děláme (https://www.ef.com/pg/)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Cactus Language offers over 20 languages taught in more than 120 locations all over the world, including English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, and others. 
 
 Links: ['\n    Accept\n   (javascript:void(0);)', "Don't ask me again (javascript:void(0);)", ' (https://www.facebook.com/cactuslanguagetraining)', ' (https://twitter.com/cactuslanguage)', ' (https://plus.google.com/+Cactuslanguage01/posts)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: GV English offers General English, English for Academic Purposes, Business English, and English Exam Preparation courses in both Calgary and Victoria, Canada. They also offer Private English Lessons and Pathway programs. Test Centres for the Celpip and IELTS exams are available, along with services such as a Free English Level Check and Visa & Immigration assistance. Accommodations and activities are also provided. 
 
 Links: ['ENGLISH PROGRAMS (https://gvenglish.com/canada/english-courses/)', 'English in Canada (https://www.gvenglish.com/canada/english-courses)', 'General English Program (https://www.gvenglish.com/canada/english-courses/general-english/)', 'English for Academic Purposes (https://www.gvenglish.com/canada/english-courses/english-for-academic-purposes/)', 'Business English Program (https://www.gvenglish.com/canada/english-courses/business-english/)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
